attributes.action: Implement the agency workers dirctive as soon as possible.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to petition the prime minister to implement the agency workers directive as quickly as possible so that hundreds of thousands of people are treated fairly and are no longer exploited by big buisness who refuse to offer full time employment because they are able to push rates down due to the current economic climate.
